monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Aura: When an allied monster applies a Debuff, it has a 60% chance to gain a random Buff.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: This Monster may apply an additional stack of any Debuff. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Acid Hurricane
skills.description: 3 x 95% (285%) magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 75% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Acid Rain
skills.description: 3 x 55% (165%) magical damage (water) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Acid Rain Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 50% (200%) magical damage (water) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Acid Rain Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 65% (260%) magical damage (water) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Acid Rain Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 65% (325%) magical damage (water) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Acid Rain Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) magical damage (water) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Acid Tempest
skills.description: 1 x 155% magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Acid Tempest Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 95% (190%) magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Acid Tempest Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 125% (250%) magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Aging
skills.description: At the end of its turn, this Monster gains an Age stack.

skills.name: Armor Crush
skills.description: Unique Aura: When a Monster in the party applies Armor Break on an enemy, 40% chance to spread it to another enemy.

skills.name: Cascade
skills.description: The power of every consecutive hit during an ability is increased by 5% continuously. (For a 4 hit attack: +0%, +5%, +10%, +15%)

skills.name: Cataclysm
skills.description: 4 x 75% (300%) magical damage (fire/water/wind/earth) Hits all enemies Applies Burn, Chill, Shock or Poison

skills.name: Cleanse
skills.description: Every hit has a 25% chance to remove a Buff from the target.

skills.name: Combo Initiator
skills.description: If this Monster acts first in the turn, it deals 25% more damage with its attack and deals an additional 25% damage hit.

skills.name: Debuff Mastery
skills.description: This Monster may apply an additional stack of any Debuff. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Debuff Resistance
skills.description: Debuff effects reduced by 50%

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 36)

skills.name: Demotivate
skills.description: Unique Aura: Weakness (Debuff) reduces enemies' healing and shielding by 20%.

skills.name: Disease Control
skills.description: Receive 4% reduced damage from a debuffed enemy for each Debuff on them.

skills.name: Dodging
skills.description: Increases chance to dodge enemy hits by 8%.

skills.name: Dominance
skills.description: Aura: Enemies receive 3% increased damage for each Debuff on them.

skills.name: Double Impact
skills.description: When exploiting an enemy's weakness with an attack, trigger an additional 50% damage hit.

skills.name: Fatal Upkeep
skills.description: Aura: Poison, Burn and Congeal damage dealt to enemies is increased by 20%.

skills.name: Firestorm
skills.description: 1 x 160% magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Firestorm Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Firestorm Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Hex
skills.description: Every hit has a 7.5% chance to apply a random Debuff.

skills.name: Ignite
skills.description: 3 x 55% (165%) magical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Ignite Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 50% (200%) magical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Ignite Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 50% (250%) magical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Ignite Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 65% (325%) magical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Ignite Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) magical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Incinerate
skills.description: Unique Aura: When an enemy takes Burn (Debuff) damage, 40% chance to apply Armor Break.

skills.name: Ion Beam
skills.description: 9 x 60% (540%) magical damage (wind) Every hit has a 15% chance to apply a random Debuff.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Magical Weakness
skills.description: Magical damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Mana Burn
skills.description: Whenever an enemy takes Burn (Debuff) damage, regenerate 10 Mana.

skills.name: Mana Focus
skills.description: Mana and Mana Regeneration values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mana Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Shielding
skills.description: When attacking an enemy, generate a Shield equal to 15% of Max Mana for each hit.

skills.name: Mass Mystify
skills.description: Aura: When an allied monster applies a Debuff, it has a 60% chance to gain a random Buff.

skills.name: Occult Control
skills.description: Aura: Occult Monsters in the party receive 3% reduced damage from a debuffed enemy for each Debuff on them.

skills.name: Physical Resistance
skills.description: Physical damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Proliferate
skills.description: When applying a Debuff, trigger an additional 30% damage hit.

skills.name: Spore
skills.description: 3 x 55% (165%) magical damage (earth) Applies Weakness (Debuff)

skills.name: Stunned
skills.description: Unique Aura: Shock (Debuff) also reduces enemy's Dodge Chance by 10% and their Critical Chance by 7%.

skills.name: Toxic Reaction
skills.description: Unique Aura: When an enemy receives Shock damage, there is a 40% chance to apply Poison.
